item.description:
** UPDATE **

Kelly will be at the bottom of the front steps to the library at 6pm to meet before the talk. she will also be going for coffee after the talk (probably Koffee on Audubon St) if anyone's interested in joining her.

------------------------------------------------------------------

As part of their "Writers LIVE" series, the New Haven Public Library will be hosting Ishmael Beah, who will be discussing his book "A Long Way Gone: Memoirs of a Boy Soldier." Incidentally, Ishmael was recently interviewed by Jon Stewart on the Daily Show. The clip can be viewed at this link.

your contact for this event is Kelly: (203) 843-5306
item.name: Tues., 4/10 - Author Ishmael Beah @ the New Haven Public Library
